entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023
